about_the_game:
Create and collect slime and generate raw resources using various facilities, each with their own uses and upgrades.

Either click on the big slime to create more slime, or start making slime generating buildings to automate the process! As the game continues, more buildings and upgrades will require more collected slime, which can be obtained by upgrading raw resources and building.. and the loop continues!

Raw resources are the ingredients to create more slime, including glue, borax, water and of course, magic stones!. Each raw resource has its own facility with its own upgrades to generate more and more over time.

Learn mechanics such as having the correct amount of each resource to ensure your slime generation stays efficient, and monitoring water temperature to keep the slime within safe limits, keeping the slime's tank from cracking from being filled over capacity... But no worries, mistakes happen! Facilities can be sold for slime back afford tank fixes and more collecting capabilities.

This idle game can get into very big numbers, hope you remember your scientific notation from science class ;)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
